result.eng: Do you need more?
result.ga: An bhfuil níos mó de dhíth ort
result.orig: An bhfuil níos mó de dhíth ort
result.html: An bhfuil níos mó de dhíth ortDo you need more?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil níos mó de ḋíṫ ortDo you need more?

result.eng: Would you do me a favour? - Fine, what do you need?
result.ga: An ndéanfá gar dom - Go breá cad atá uait
result.orig: An ndéanfá gar dom - Go breá cad atá uait
result.html: An ndéanfá gar dom - Go breá cad atá uaitWould you do me a favour? - Fine, what do you need?
result.ponchtml: An ndéanfá gar dom - Go breá cad atá uaitWould you do me a favour? - Fine, what do you need?

result.eng: I will need to the contract in writing.
result.ga: Beidh an conradh uaim i scríbhinn
result.orig: Beidh an conradh uaim i scríbhinn
result.html: Beidh an conradh uaim i scríbhinnI will need to the contract in writing.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ an conraḋ uaim i scríḃinnI will need to the contract in writing.

result.eng: What do you need to do the job?
result.ga: Cad a theastaíonn uait chun an jab a dhéanamh
result.orig: Cad a theastaíonn uait chun an jab a dhéanamh
result.html: Cad a theastaíonn uait chun an jab a dhéanamhWhat do you need to do the job?
result.ponchtml: Cad a ṫeastaíonn uait ċun an jab a ḋéanaṁWhat do you need to do the job?

result.eng: We need to take a chance and try it.
result.ga: Caithfidh muid dul sa seans agus triail a bhaint as
result.orig: Caithfidh muid dul sa seans agus triail a bhaint as
result.html: Caithfidh muid dul sa seans agus triail a bhaint asWe need to take a chance and try it.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ muid dul sa seans agus triail a ḃaint asWe need to take a chance and try it.

result.eng: I need to look into the question.
result.ga: Caithfidh mé an cheist a fhiosrú
result.orig: Caithfidh mé an cheist a fhiosrú
result.html: Caithfidh mé an cheist a fhiosrúI need to look into the question.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ mé an ċeist a ḟiosrúI need to look into the question.

result.eng: I need to discuss something with you.
result.ga: Caithfidh mé rud éigin a phlé leat
result.orig: Caithfidh mé rud éigin a phlé leat
result.html: Caithfidh mé rud éigin a phlé leatI need to discuss something with you.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ mé rud éigin a ṗlé leatI need to discuss something with you.

result.eng: When do I need to make payment?
result.ga: Cathain is gá dom íocaíocht a dhéanamh
result.orig: Cathain is gá dom íocaíocht a dhéanamh
result.html: Cathain is gá dom íocaíocht a dhéanamhWhen do I need to make payment?
result.ponchtml: Caṫain is gá dom íocaíoċt a ḋéanaṁWhen do I need to make payment?

result.eng: I need an extra day.
result.ga: Tá lá breise uaim
result.orig: Tá lá breise uaim
result.html: Tá lá breise uaimI need an extra day.
result.ponchtml: Tá lá breise uaimI need an extra day.

result.eng: You don't need to wait till the end.
result.ga: Ní gá duit fanacht go dtí an deireadh
result.orig: Ní gá duit fanacht go dtí an deireadh
result.html: Ní gá duit fanacht go dtí an deireadhYou don't need to wait till the end.
result.ponchtml: Ní gá duit fanaċt go dtí an deireaḋYou don't need to wait till the end.

result.eng: I don't need more, thank you.
result.ga: Níl a thuilleadh uaim go raibh maith agat
result.orig: Níl a thuilleadh uaim go raibh maith agat
result.html: Níl a thuilleadh uaim go raibh maith agatI don't need more, thank you.
result.ponchtml: Níl a ṫuilleaḋ uaim go raiḃ maiṫ agatI don't need more, thank you.

result.eng: No need to thank me, my friend.
result.ga: Níl aon bhuíochas ort a chara
result.orig: Níl aon bhuíochas ort a chara
result.html: Níl aon bhuíochas ort a charaNo need to thank me, my friend.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon ḃuíoċas ort a ċaraNo need to thank me, my friend.

result.eng: We need a professional writer, such as a journalist.
result.ga: Scríbhneoir proifisiúnta atá uainn dála iriseora
result.orig: Scríbhneoir proifisiúnta atá uainn dála iriseora
result.html: Scríbhneoir proifisiúnta atá uainn dála iriseoraWe need a professional writer, such as a journalist.
result.ponchtml: Scríḃneoir proifisiúnta atá uainn dála iriseoraWe need a professional writer, such as a journalist.

result.eng: We need a leader with a vision.
result.ga: Teastaíonn ceannaire uainn a bhfuil fís aige
result.orig: Teastaíonn ceannaire uainn a bhfuil fís aige
result.html: Teastaíonn ceannaire uainn a bhfuil fís aigeWe need a leader with a vision.
result.ponchtml: Teastaíonn ceannaire uainn a ḃfuil fís aigeWe need a leader with a vision.

result.eng: I need to talk to you about my contract.
result.ga: Teastaíonn uaim labhairt leat maidir le mo chonradh
result.orig: Teastaíonn uaim labhairt leat maidir le mo chonradh
result.html: Teastaíonn uaim labhairt leat maidir le mo chonradhI need to talk to you about my contract.
result.ponchtml: Teastaíonn uaim laḃairt leat maidir le mo ċonraḋI need to talk to you about my contract.

result.eng: I need it now!
result.ga: Tá gá agam leis anois
result.orig: Tá gá agam leis anois
result.html: Tá gá agam leis anoisI need it now!
result.ponchtml: Tá gá agam leis anoisI need it now!

result.eng: I need more time to examine the question properly.
result.ga: Tá níos mó ama uaim chun an cheist a chíoradh i gceart
result.orig: Tá níos mó ama uaim chun an cheist a chíoradh i gceart
result.html: Tá níos mó ama uaim chun an cheist a chíoradh i gceartI need more time to examine the question properly.
result.ponchtml: Tá níos mó ama uaim ċun an ċeist a ċíoraḋ i gceartI need more time to examine the question properly.

result.eng: Hello! What do you need?
result.ga: Dia dhuit Céard atá ag teastáil uait
result.orig: Dia dhuit Céard atá ag teastáil uait
result.html: Dia dhuit Céard atá ag teastáil uaitHello! What do you need?
result.ponchtml: Dia ḋuit Céard atá ag teastáil uaitHello! What do you need?

result.eng: How many bedrooms do you need?
result.ga: Cé mhéad seomra codlata atá uait
result.orig: Cé mhéad seomra codlata atá uait
result.html: Cé mhéad seomra codlata atá uaitHow many bedrooms do you need?
result.ponchtml: Cé ṁéad seomra codlata atá uaitHow many bedrooms do you need?

result.eng: Do you need two hours to prepare yourself in the morning?
result.ga: An mbíonn dhá uair a' chloig uait le tú féin a réiteach ar maidin
result.orig: An mbíonn dhá uair a' chloig uait le tú féin a réiteach ar maidin
result.html: An mbíonn dhá uair a' chloig uait le tú féin a réiteach ar maidinDo you need two hours to prepare yourself in the morning?
result.ponchtml: An mbíonn ḋá uair a' ċloig uait le tú féin a réiteaċ ar maidinDo you need two hours to prepare yourself in the morning?

result.eng: I can go with you if you need help.
result.ga: Is féidir liom dul leat má tá cúnamh uait
result.orig: Is féidir liom dul leat má tá cúnamh uait
result.html: Is féidir liom dul leat má tá cúnamh uaitI can go with you if you need help.
result.ponchtml: Is féidir liom dul leat má tá cúnaṁ uaitI can go with you if you need help.

result.eng: Do you need more milk with that?
result.ga: An bhfuil tuilleadh bainne uait leis sin
result.orig: An bhfuil tuilleadh bainne uait leis sin
result.html: An bhfuil tuilleadh bainne uait leis sinDo you need more milk with that?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil tuilleaḋ bainne uait leis sinDo you need more milk with that?

result.eng: What do you need?
result.ga: Céard atá uaibh
result.orig: Céard atá uaibh
result.html: Céard atá uaibhWhat do you need?
result.ponchtml: Céard atá uaiḃWhat do you need?

result.eng: We need a bottle of milk also, Micí.
result.ga: Tá buidéal bainne uainn freisin a Mhicí
result.orig: Tá buidéal bainne uainn freisin a Mhicí
result.html: Tá buidéal bainne uainn freisin a MhicíWe need a bottle of milk also, Micí.
result.ponchtml: Tá buidéal bainne uainn freisin a ṀicíWe need a bottle of milk also, Micí.

result.eng: Do you need anything else?
result.ga: An bhfuil aon rud eile uaibh
result.orig: An bhfuil aon rud eile uaibh
result.html: An bhfuil aon rud eile uaibhDo you need anything else?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil aon rud eile uaiḃDo you need anything else?

result.eng: I need to close the door.
result.ga: Caithfidh mé an doras a dhúnadh
result.orig: Caithfidh mé an doras a dhúnadh
result.html: Caithfidh mé an doras a dhúnadhI need to close the door.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ mé an doras a ḋúnaḋI need to close the door.

result.eng: I'm tired of the place and I need a change of scenery.
result.ga: Tá mé tuirseach den áit agus tá malairt dreach tíre ag teastáil uaim
result.orig: Tá mé tuirseach den áit agus tá malairt dreach tíre ag teastáil uaim
result.html: Tá mé tuirseach den áit agus tá malairt dreach tíre ag teastáil uaimI'm tired of the place and I need a change of scenery.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé tuirseaċ den áit agus tá malairt dreaċ tíre ag teastáil uaimI'm tired of the place and I need a change of scenery.

result.eng: You didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.
result.ga: Ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadh
result.orig: Ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadh
result.html: Ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadhYou didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ aon ġá le heagarṫóir a ṫuilleaḋ le do leagan féin de ċeird na hiriseoireaċta a ċleaċtaḋYou didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.

result.eng: All you need to care about is that the old folks are happy.
result.ga: Is cuma duitse ach an tseanlánúin a bheith sásta
result.orig: Is cuma duitse ach an tseanlánúin a bheith sásta
result.html: Is cuma duitse ach an tseanlánúin a bheith sástaAll you need to care about is that the old folks are happy.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma duitse aċ an tseanlánúin a ḃeiṫ sástaAll you need to care about is that the old folks are happy.

result.eng: All you need to care aboit in this world is to steal in a way the law allows.
result.ga: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo ach goid de réir dlí
result.orig: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo ach goid de réir dlí
result.html: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo ach goid de réir dlíAll you need to care aboit in this world is to steal in a way the law allows.
